title: Mike Pence Signed Law Forcing Women to Pay for Fetus ‘Funerals’?
subtitle: The measure, which concerned the disposal of fetal remains, was part of a bigger anti-abortion law passed by state legislators in March 2016.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Republican vice presidential candidate Mike Pence signed legislation forcing women to hold funerals for miscarried or aborted fetuses.
